CustomField.formula: if(OR( IsPickVal(amc__Status__c, "Complete"), IsPickVal(amc__Status__c, "Cancelled"), amc__Hours_Completed_Non_Billable__c > amc__Hours_Scheduled_Non_Billable__c), 0, amc__Hours_Scheduled_Non_Billable__c - amc__Hours_Completed_Non_Billable__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the number of non billable hours remaining for this Action
CustomField.label: Hours Remaining - Non Billable
